title: Red Acid Dye
summaries: Red Acid Dye is a dye sometimes acquired from the Dye Trader after completing a Strange Plant quest. When put in the dye slot, it provides the same effect that the other Acid Dye variants produce. Armor dyed by it can be seen in the dark, but does not provide light.
Equipping <linked>Acid Dye</linked>, Red Acid Dye or <linked>Blue Acid Dye</linked> on the <linked>Shadow Orb</linked> can make parts of it or the whole orb invisible.

statistics.Sell: 20 SC
